wordpressPost.title: Special launch offer
wordpressPost.content:
To celebrate 15 years of online and open access publishing at the BMJ Group, any articles submitted to BMJ Open before 31 January 2011 will have their article-processing charge waivedÂ at acceptance.

In May 1995 the BMJ became the first general medical journal to launch itself into cyberspace – see the development of bmj.com here.
